client.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGame

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGame
    The Game entity class; keeps track of the state of the current WordSweeper game
    Author:
    quangvu
